night_horizons.image_processing.batch module¶

Module for handling batch processing of images.

class night_horizons.image_processing.batch.BatchProcessor(io_manager: IOManager, processor: Processor, log_keys: list[str] = ['ind', 'return_code'], passthrough: list[str] | bool = True, scorer: Processor = None)¶

Bases: LoopLoggerMixin, TransformerMixin, BaseEstimator

Base class for processing images in batches.

batch_process(processor: Processor, X: DataFrame, y=None) → DataFrame¶

Batch process the data using a given processor.

Parameters¶

processorProcessor

The processor object used to process each row of the data.

Xpd.DataFrame

The input data to be processed.

yNone, optional

The target data (default is None).

Returns¶

pd.DataFrame

The processed output data.

A dictionary of additional resources.

Transform and predict are the same functions.

Preprocesses the input data. This method is intended to be overwritten by subclasses.

Parameters¶

The input data to be preprocessed.

Returns¶

A tuple containing the preprocessed data and an empty dictionary.
